Minor Requirements: Minimum grade of 'C' in courses applied to the minor
Students may complete a maximum of one major or minor from Economics

Complete 6-9 credits from the following:: ECON 414 - Economics of Antitrust and Regulation (3)
ECON 437 - The Economics of Natural Resources (3)
ECON 454 - Economics of Education and Human Capital (3)
ECON 464 - State and Local Public Finance (3)
